Today we’re proud to boast a strong team of IT engineers who thrive on rolling up their sleeves and solving your IT problems and meeting your business needs.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1575627718093{padding-top: 35px !important;}”][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1555991134461{margin-right: 17.5px !important;margin-left: 17.5px !important;background-image: url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft-3/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/285-jir-60871-nam-eye-id-392451-jpeg1.jpg?id=141) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”200px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1555991711406{margin-right: 17.5px !important;margin-left: 17.5px !important;padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 12% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;background-color: #32f0f0 !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”OUR PEOPLE MAKE US SPECIAL” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]

  • Our people love being here
  • We have a 95%+ retention rate for engineers
  • We promote long-term relationships with clients
  • Our team are passionate people who really know your system
[vc_column_text]Find out more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1575627918002{padding-top: 65px !important;}”][vc_column width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1555992722983{margin-right: 17.5px !important;margin-left: 17.5px !important;padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 12% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;background-color: #fef1ef !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”MORE THAN JUST IT EXPERTISE” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]
  • Manage entire IT infrastructures so you can focus on growing your business.
  • Provide help and expertise to accomplish a specific project.
  • Engage with end users and deliver responsive support on an IT strategy that aligns with business goals.
[vc_column_text]Find out more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1555991373716{margin-right: 17.5px !important;margin-left: 17.5px !important;background-image: url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft-3/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/k-95-ake-367f-l_2-id-55372-jpeg1.jpg?id=180) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”200px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1575627907977{padding-top: 65px !important;}”][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1555991424297{margin-right: 17.5px !important;margin-left: 17.5px !important;background-image: url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft-3/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/308-name05821-chim-eye-e1553310919236.jpg?id=649) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”200px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1555992705094{margin-right: 17.5px !important;margin-left: 17.5px !important;padding-top: 12% !important;padding-right: 15% !important;padding-bottom: 12% !important;padding-left: 15% !important;background-color: #8dd7e5 !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”GET BACK TO YOUR CORE BUSINESS IN 12 MINUTES” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”]
  • 12 minutes. And a few button clicks. That’s all it takes to set up your fully-hosted and managed Aiven services.
  • Our services run on highly-available, dedicated VMs that are encrypted at rest and transfer. Are you ready to get back to your core business?

No matter the business, NanoSoft has you covered with industry compliant solutions.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1554110332900{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/5″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1402″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1403″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1405″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1406″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″ offset=”vc_col-lg-1/5 vc_col-xs-4″][vc_single_image image=”1404″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575628209657{margin-top: -10% !important;}”][vc_row_inner el_class=”shadow” css=”.vc_custom_1575628191030{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner el_class=”custom-border” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1575628147273{border-top-width: 20px !important;padding-top: 10% !important;padding-right: 9% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 9% !important;border-top-color: rgba(0,155,187,0.7) !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}”]

Being back with NanoSoft just gives me peace of mind knowing that my technology is functioning seamlessly behind the scenes without it interfering with and disrupting our day-to-day operations.

Mrs. Jeffrey
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1575628179201{border-top-width: 20px !important;padding-top: 10% !important;padding-right: 9% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;padding-left: 9% !important;border-top-color: #009bbb !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}”]

Very late in the day, I received a request from our director to obtain a quote for software and laptops. We needed them by noon the next day. But John Doe was able to get those to us first thing in the morning.

Mr. Richard
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575627758295{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”why choose us” font_container=”tag:h6|font_size:18px|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_custom_heading text=”6 REASONS TO PARTNER WITH US” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

  • Quick response

    We can log in to your PC or server remotely and resolve many issues immediately without the wait for a technician to travel to your location.

  • Experienced

    In more than 30 years of IT outsourcing, we have gained experience in a wide spectrum of technologies, industries, and application types.

  • No geek speak

    You deserve to have your questions answered in plain English. Our technicians will clearly explain what is happening so you understand.

  • Business savvy

    We design, evaluate and justify technology solutions from a thorough understanding of the business benefit for your company.

  • One Stop Shop

    We handle all aspects of your IT infrastructure including hardware, software management and any other related technology needs.

  • 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

    We want you to be completely satisfied with our services. We will do whatever it takes to make you happy. No hassles, no problems.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1575627765246{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 8% !important;padding-bottom: 8% !important;background: #32f0f0 url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft-3/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/slider-1.jpg?id=1059) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”mask”][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1556097596478{padding: 15% !important;background: #ffffff url(https://live.21lab.co/nanosoft-3/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/map2.png?id=2348) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: contain !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”world class IT solutions partner of choice” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|line_height:1.1em” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_custom_heading text=”29″ font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:72px|text_align:center|color:%23ff0055|line_height:1″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”YEARS OF EXPERINCE” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]
